entry.title: Mailing List Future
entry.summary: The email indicates that the sender, Vincent, has proposed using the website https://delvingbitcoin.org for the initial part of 2024. The plan appears to involve utilizing this resource temporarily, with the intention of reassessing its use as required at a later time within the year. This suggests a provisional approach in their strategy, leaving room for adjustments based on the outcomes or changing needs that may arise during the period mentioned.
